### Ingest the data


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

# Load data
url_root <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UN-AVT/kamino-source/main/sources/0-shared/data/"
url_file <- "world-wealth-report/number-of-millionaires.csv"
url <- paste0(url_root, url_file)

df <- read.csv(url, header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```


### Plot
#### Number of Millionaires

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

# Common theme for both charts
theme_opts <- theme(
    legend.position='none', 
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", colour = "white"), 
    text = element_text(family = "inconsolata"), 
    plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 30, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 21),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 18),
    axis.text = element_text(size=18,face = "bold" ),
    axis.title.x = element_blank(),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.x = element_line(size = 0.5, linetype = 'solid', colour = "#b0bfc8"),
    panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank()
    )

world <- df[10,]
df <- df[-10,]


v1 <- df %>% mutate(Color = ifelse(Gain.Loss > 0, "loss", "gain")) %>%
  ggplot(aes( x = Gain.Loss, y = reorder(Country, Gain.Loss))) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", aes(fill = Color)) +
  geom_text(aes(label = Gain.Loss,  colour = Color),hjust = 1.2, size = 8) +
  scale_colour_manual(values=c("black", "white"))+
  geom_vline( xintercept = 0, colour = "black", linetype = "solid", size = 0.5 ) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-120, 2300))+
  labs(title = "Gains and losses in the number of Millionaires",
       subtitle = "2019-2020(in Thousands)",
       caption = "Source: Credit Suisse, Global Wealth Report 2020") +
  annotate("text", x = 1700, y = 4, label= "World\n+5,632", size = 7, fontface = 'bold')+
  annotate("text", x = 1590, y = 4, label= sprintf('\u2191'), size = 11, fontface = 'bold', color = '#00BFC4')+
  theme_minimal()+
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 15,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.6)))

```
